mean_cn: adj. 连续性的，继续的，接连的
mean_en: following one after the other in a series : following each other without interruption
word_etyma: succession接连 + al形容词后缀 → successional 接连的
short_phrase: The successional rules help this baby.
sentence: The successional rules mean this baby will later be King.
sentence_trans: 按照继承规定，这个婴儿将会成为国王。
